snippet.title: Elements Game Dev Interview - New Overlords
snippet.description:
I was humbled to be asked by Jeff, who I met at PAX to be interviewed. Jeff, Sema and I chat about the game, how I got started, and ideas about making great games. Thank you Jeff and Sema. Check out their channel here https://www.youtube.com/@NewOverlords
This video was first published on their channel on 12 December 2022.

Elements Kickstarter Coming Jan 31st! https://tinyurl.com/elementskickstarter

Wishlist Elements here https://store.steampowered.com/app/1468110/Elements/
Come join our discord https://discord.gg/psFZzqgB6r to give me feedback on how to make the game great.

Elements is a beautiful open-world adventure game about two siblings fulfilling their destiny. Go in search of the elemental stones to uncover magic and mystery.
Elements is made with Unreal Engine.
